name: Avoid Programs with too many WHERE Clauses  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches all the programs having too many WHERE clauses.
output:
This report lists RPG300 Programs having more than 5 WHERE Clauses.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Program full name
rationale: Having complex queries in Programs can cause performance problems.
remediation: The best solution is to review the query to reduce the number of WHERE clauses.
remediationSample:
The best solution is to review the query to reduce the number of WHERE clauses or use join:
SELECT e.entertainerid, 
       e.firstname, 
       e.lastname, 
       b.customerid, 
       b.eventdate, 
       bd.category, 
       bd.duration, 
       s.specialitydescription, 
       es.entertainerspecialitycost
  FROM ENTERTAINER e
  JOIN BOOKINGDETAIL bd ON bd.entertainerid = e.entertainerid
  JOIN BOOKING b ON b.bookingid = bd.bookingid
  JOIN ENTERTAINERSPECIALITY es ON es.entertainerid = e.entertainerid
  JOIN SPECIALITY s ON s.specialityid = es.specialityid
 WHERE e.entertainerid = 1
sample:
SELECT e.entertainerid, 
       e.firstname, 
       e.lastname, 
       b.customerid, 
       b.eventdate, 
       bd.category, 
       bd.duration, 
       s.specialitydescription, 
       es.entertainerspecialitycost
  FROM Entertainer e,
       BookingDetail bd,
       Booking b,
       EntertainerSpeciality es,
       Speciality s
 WHERE e.entertainerid = bd.entertainerid
   AND b.bookingid = bd.bookingid
   AND e.entertainerid = es.entertainerid
   AND s.specialityid = es.specialityid
   AND e.entertainerid = 1
alternativeName: Avoid Programs with too many WHERE Clauses  (RPG300)
